name: Ifa
title: "In the Wake of Wandering Winds" Ifa

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Ifa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Airborne Disease Prevention
skills.desc:
Deals ? ?, enters Nightsoul's Blessing, gains 2 Nightsoul points, and applies Cacucu to self. (This skill cannot be used after the character enters Nightsoul's Blessing.)
(Characters with Cacucu attached can use the Technique: Supporting Fire)

skills.name: Compound Sedation Field
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, heals the character on your team who has taken the most DMG for 2 HP. If this Skill triggers Anemo-Related Reactions, attach a Sedation Mark of the corresponding element to the opponent's active character.
